text: "Destroyer" is a 1981 song by British band The Kinks and is the leading single from their 19th studio album Give the People What They Want. It was released in the United States only and made number 85 in the United States. It was not released in the United Kingdom. == References == Category:1981 songs Category:The Kinks songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Destroyer (The Kinks song)
